title: Screen, 18th century
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description:
Coromandel screen 
Eight-fold screen decorated aas a continuous field, with a scene of four European ships landing in China. European figures are setting out on shore with gifts for the Emperor. Main border with representations of the Hundred Antiques. Inner guard border with repeat motif of fantastic lion-faced dragon; outer guard border with repeat motif of flowers and vine. 
Late 17th- Early 18th Century; or Late 19th Century in 17th to 18th Century Style

tombstone.epitaph:
Screen, 18th century.
18th century. Coromandel lacquer. Bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1926-22-327.
